tool_description:
List of upcoming video game releases. You can filter by name or by platform.

Data is updated several times a day to have always the latest releases.
name: Video game calendar release
title: Video game calendar release

api_list.name: Release games detail
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://video-game-calendar-release.p.rapidapi.com/820"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-game-calendar-release.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://video-game-calendar-release.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "video-game-calendar-release.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List video game releases
api_list.description: List of the latest releases. Ordered by date of publication.

optional_parameters.name: platforms
optional_parameters.description: You can filter by multiple platforms separe it by \\\",\\\". Example: `xbox,mac`.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description: You can sort DESC adding \\\"-\\\" at start. Example: `-name`
